content.rendered:
RAISING THE BENCHMARK FOR APARTMENT LIVING IN THE MIDRAND AREA

Crowthorne Corner Luxury Apartments is located along Whisken Avenue in Midrand, where it is in close proximity to many different retail nodes with restaurants, schools, office parks and has easy access to the N1 Highway between Joburg and Pretoria. Designed to be more spacious than other apartment developments in the area, Crowthorne Corner boasts stunning fittings and finishes along with read face-brick feature walls. The carefree lifestyle is enhance by the secure gatehouse that is manned 24/7 by courteous, highly trained security guards. The clubhouse has a swimming pool, double-storey gym and a laundromat.
Contact Byron
Contact Ayanda
BROCHURE
ESTATE RULES
ESTATE LOCATION

ESTATE FEATURES

1-bed, 2-bed, 3-bed and 4-bed apartments to rent
Sizes range from 48m² – 128m²
Rent from R7,600pm – R16,300pm
Modern open plan layouts with quality finishes
Tight security with biometric fingerprint access
Best value for money lifestyle in the Midrand/Kyalami area
Close proximity to retail centres
Free internet in each apartment
Care-free living as maintenance is included
Free weekly activities and social events for kids and adults

OUTDOOR FACILITIES

Walking Trails/Paths
Children’s Play Parks
Braai Facilities
Classes
Swimming Pool

INDOOR FACILITIES

Multi-purpose Clubhouse

TAKE A LOOK AT SOME OF OUR LAYOUTS BELOW

CROWTHORNE CORNER IS ON SHOW 7 DAYS A WEEK FROM 9:00 UNTIL 17:00
